entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
